plaintiff.name: Michael Rodriguez
plaintiff.consumer_status: Individual 'consumer' within the meaning of both the FCRA and the Michigan FCRA

defendants.name: WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
defendants.business_status: Duly authorized and qualified to do business in the State of Michigan

factual_background.summary: Plaintiff disputes erroneous late payment reporting on Wells Fargo auto loan after payments were made on time.

events.description: Plaintiff obtained auto loan from Wells Fargo.
Wells Fargo incorrectly reported late payments despite timely payments.
Plaintiff disputed with Wells Fargo multiple times.
Plaintiff disputed with Experian in writing.

additional_notes: Plaintiff has bank records showing timely payments
Wells Fargo acknowledged error internally but continued reporting

causes_of_action.title: VIOLATION OF THE FCRA
allegations: Defendants violated FCRA by failing to conduct reasonable investigations of plaintiff's disputes.

damages.summary: Plaintiff suffered damage to credit score and was denied for refinancing.
